Html:
From EJ ( http://elitistjerks.com/f78/t105429-cataclysm_mechanics_testing/p8/#post1830133 )

My first test was just to check procc rate and it seems to be 1PPM. Did it with a 2.2 sword and flowers in offhand, ~3.6% was the expected procc rate but got 3.2%.
Special attacks (tested with SS) can procc it, so can FoK.
It benefits from the 8% spellpower buff, seem to have a 150% crit and I'm fairly sure it is spell crit.
On the sad news however, it does not seem to benefit from Bandit's guile (got a 4k procc during deep insight)

Most interesting thing here that it seem to not have any ICD at all, or if it does a very short one. Observed proccs as close as 5 sec after each other in my first test when the log wasnt that spammy.

I'm not sure I have it modeled perfectly in my Rawr, I have it as Physical hit, no ICD, 5000 nature dmg, 3% chance.  I'm not sure this accounts for it being critable, nor the spellpower buff or miss chance (reportedly misses on spell hit table from other sources).  By this modeling it's a decent trinket but not BiS.  Any suggestions on changes to my settings for it?  Or do I have it about right?

Well I currently have it set at 5% chance in the latest release (4.0.14b) so it being at 3.2% - 3.6% is not too terribly off. This was actually one of the few trinket procs I was having issues with in terms of modeling, so any additional information would be helpful. Some useful information would be to get the number attacks and the number of procs.

I turned mine in today and spent some time on the raider dummy.  Looking pretty dismal for cat spec, honestly.  Two different 3 minute full rotation trials, both only 5 procs.  It can miss, it can crit (150% crit).  No buffs, though I did use Berserk once and Lifeblood twice each run.

Attacks that might have been able to proc in the last 3 min run:

48 Shred, 203 Melee, 4 Ferocious Bite, 17 Fury Swipes, 5 Mangle, 14 Rake

That's a 1.7% proc chance assuming all of those can proc.  The counts were roughly the same for the other 3 min run.

Inputting 1.7% in Rawr lines up almost exactly with modeling it as 1 PPM no ICD which is what the EJ rogue forums have been proposing is the correct model.  Seems like more data in support of that.  I'm moving my Rawr to 1 PPM and I'll probably just wear this for PvP :(.

Well...that was a huge waste of herb farming haha...
